Sort by name:
[Alice B. Johnson, Bob C. Doe, Jane A. Smith, John Doe]
Sort by last name, then first name:
[Bob C. Doe, John Doe, Alice B. Johnson, Jane A. Smith]
Sort by length of name:
[John Doe, Bob C. Doe, Jane A. Smith, Alice B. Johnson]
Sort by middle name, null first:
[John Doe, Jane A. Smith, Alice B. Johnson, Bob C. Doe]
Sort by name in reversed order:
[John Doe, Jane A. Smith, Bob C. Doe, Alice B. Johnson]
